thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com | 5 of 178
thread.title: Ms Jane Riddell
thread.title_full: TrustedHousesitters reviewed by Ms Jane Riddell

author: Ms Jane Riddell
title: Ms Jane Riddell
text: I've been a member now for over four years and am continually impressed by the organisation's desire to develop and to respond to its members' views. THS is professional, fair and provides an excellent service. Its website is user-friendly, its communication is prompt and clear. It has changed my life as far as travel is concerned. I recommend it to many people, and not just because of the two free months subscription I'll receive if friends join up.
